page.title: 19"MY SATURDAY" BY JENNIFER.
page.content:
{HOW I SPENT SATURDAY 8th JUNE 1985.
I awoke at 9:10am. For breakfast I had Coco Pops and a cup of tea. After that I watched Godzilla, who is a Prehistoric Dinosaur, on T.V. At 10:00am I fed Dad's cattle and helped him put up an electric fence. In the afternoon Mum took us to the fair at Kirriemuir. We went on a roundabout and the Waltzers. Then we visited the Spin & Skidd.That was great! Afterwards I had a candyfloss and pie and potatoes for tea. At 9:30pm my family went for a car run round Glen Clova. We then went to Kirriemuir for fish and chips. I went to bed at 24:00.
